description:
Kunzite is the fourth and final member of the Shiten`ou, and the highest in rank and by far the strongest. Unlike the others, he wears a white cape in addition to his uniform.
Kunzite and Zoisite are very close in the anime, lovers as well as allies. He has occasionally assisted Zoisite in obtaining the Rainbow Crystals.
He is named after the mineral kunzite.
name: Kunzite
